text: musa(mose)ga geuui salamdeul-ege malhagil “sillo hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-ege amso hanmalileul jab-eula myeonglyeonghasinola.” geudeul-i malhagil “geudaeneun ulileul jolong-geolilo samneun geos-io?” geuga malhagil “naneun hananimkke boholeul yocheongdeulini mujihan jadeul jung-ui hanaga doeji anhge hasoseo.”
